flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Planning a dinner party or hosting an impromptu get together with friends? By keeping these items in the house, you can serve up a dish with style.

Get More information about dishes with different styles at DIY Magazine

guide.summary: These conversational pieces will keep everyone talking next time you play the party host
guide.title: Indie Home: Be our guest
